root.name: Rockman Battle & Fighters
root.description: Overview Rockman Battle Fighters is a fighting game that was only released in Japan for the Neo Geo Pocket Color. Rockman Battle Fighters is essentially a downscaled port of the Arcade games Rockman Power Battle and Rockman Power Fighters. The sprites in the game much more resemble the eight bit style of the NES Rockman/Mega Man games rather than their arcade counterparts. The game has no method of saving except for high scores.
